text: Montenero Val Cocchiara is a town and comune in the Province of Isernia, in the Molise region (southern Italy). Reference http://www.mundunur.net], Website for a 334-page book about Montenero Val Cocchiara, titled: Mundunur — An Italian Mountain Village Under the Spell of South Italy, published in 2020 by Via Media Publishing. Website includes many photographs of the village. Category:Cities and towns in Molise
title: Montenero Val Cocchiara
